content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper plate factory
No entities found

### Lab
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Pipe connections
Consists of pipe connections between offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5) and boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
-  Ensure that the pipe connection does not already exist before attempting to connect
-  Make sure that the entities are close enough to connect with a pipe
-  Check that the fluid system is not empty before attempting to connect pipes

### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has enough fuel before attempting to mine
-  Make sure that the burner mining drill is not out of fuel before attempting to mine

### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel before attempting to use
-  Make sure that the boiler is not out of fuel before attempting to use

### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Ensure that the offshore pump is working before attempting to use
-  Make sure that the offshore pump has enough fluid before attempting to use

### Errors when using labs
-  Ensure that the lab has enough power before attempting to use
-  Make sure that the lab has the required input before attempting to use
